title: Localize Your ERP Solution with VIENNA Advantage New Translation Management Module for Free
text:
Localize Your ERP Solution with VIENNA Advantage New Translation Management Module for Free
Zetel, Germany, August 27, 2015 --( PR.com )-- VIENNA Advantage (www.viennaadvantage.com) has successfully released a new and innovative ERP Module - Translation Management - that helps companies to localize their ERP Solutions in as much languages they want.
“The idea behind the development of this module was simple! Experience has shown us that our international clients who work in several language environments enjoy productivity improvements and cost reduction each time we provide a new language localization for them. So we thought, why not provide a flexible and powerful tool that will allow organizations to translate their ERP system in as much languages as they need. In this way they will have a flexible ERP solution that can strongly support their international growth.” - Gligor Chavdarov, Marketing Strategist.
Benefits from Translation Management Module
VIENNA Advantage Translation Management Module has an inbuilt translation engine that simplifies and automates the translation process of the ERP into a few clicks process. In this way companies can speed up the process and have a localized version of their ERP in a few days, or even hours. As soon as the translation is done, users can check, modify and edit translation as required.
One of the most important benefits of VIENNA Advantage Translation Management Module is that users do not need to be an IT expert to do the localization. Anyone in your organization can do it. Even a person with an entry level.
Other benefit for the companies is once you make a localized translation, you will always own the intellectual property of that translation. This means that companies can export the language pack they have created and import it at another locations and it will still remain their intellectual property. No additional cost will be charged.
For Small & Mid-sized Businesses
VIENNA Advantage Translation Management Module is especially designed for small and mid-sized businesses who often have limited resources and cannot afford expensive ERP localizations. With the FREE Translation Management Module you can localize your VIENNA Advantage ERP system without spending a dollar.
For Community Contributors & Developers
VIENNA Advantage is an open source ERP and CRM with a growing and passionate community. Their members work hard to improve the community edition of the ERP system. Now with the release of the new Translation Management Module, contributors can choose to translate the ERP system into one or several languages, and commercialize those language pack by putting them on the VIENNA Advantage Market. From there they can resell the language packs to a large customer base and community around the world.
About VIENNA Advantage ERP/CRM Solution
VIENNA Advantage ERP and CRM is an open source ERP and CRM with full access to its source code. Based in Germany, it is currently one of the fastest growing open source ERP and CRM worldwide.
VIENNA Advantage is a generic ERP that can cater to all types of industries. It has a configuration layer that allows you to setup the system for any industry without customization in the code. A number of industries are already benefiting from our open source ERP such as: Automotive, Wholesale and Distribution, Retail with POS, Manufacturing, Education, Healthcare, Government and many more.
It comes with a large number of modules covering the entire needs of an enterprise: Order Management, Sales and Marketing, Customer Relationship Management, Human Resource Management, Supply Chain Management, Procurement, Manufacturing, Financial Accounting, Budgeting, Project Management, Time & Expense and several others.
VIENNA Advantage ERP and CRM is a premium open source product, a viable and attractive alternative to the proprietary products such as SAP, Microsoft Dynamics and Netsuite. Apart from covering the complete functional side of an enterprise, the specialty of the product is the ease of use and low implementation time due to a large number of ready-made industry templates and a plenty of tools which allow a quick roll-out. It offers a low risk scenarios to companies who are looking to implement a scalable open source ERP system. The product comes with the latest HTML5 technology which runs independent from the operating system and browsers in a web based environment, even supported on mobile devices like tablets.
